comments:
Build 20031202

Attempting to launch JDT Core test suites for Eclipse 2.1 self-hosting 
workspace running on Eclipse 3.0 SDK; I get the following exception:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 Dec 05, 2003 00:19:52.879
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Launch".
!STACK 0
java.lang.ClassCastException
        at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.launcher.JUnitLaunchConfiguration.findPlugin
(JUnitLaunchConfiguration.java:285)
        at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.launcher.JUnitLaunchConfiguration.addRequiredPlugins
(JUnitLaunchConfiguration.java:260)
        at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.launcher.JUnitLaunchConfiguration.computeProgramArgu
ments(JUnitLaunchConfiguration.java:172)
        at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.launcher.JUnitLaunchConfiguration.createVMRunner
(JUnitLaunchConfiguration.java:103)
        at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.launcher.JUnitLaunchConfiguration.launch
(JUnitLaunchConfiguration.java:61)
        at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch
(LaunchConfiguration.java:156)
        at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin.buildAndLaunch
(DebugUIPlugin.java:739)
        at org.eclipse.debug.ui.DebugUITools.buildAndLaunch
(DebugUITools.java:625)
        at org.eclipse.debug.ui.DebugUITools$3.run(DebugUITools.java:581)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:62)

This bug prevents testing the 2.1.3 maintenance effort. Any workaround is 
welcome.

Please use 3.0M4 (i.e. a pre-RCP build) to test against a 2.1x platform until 
this bug and bug 47880 are fixed.

The class cast exception is an OSGi aftershock.  However, even when it gets 
fixed, you would then run into a backward compatibility problem with the PDE 
Junit launcher (bug 47880).

Fixed.
To verify, I ran AllJavaModelTests from the R_2_1 maintenance branch against a 
2.1.2 platform, and 1588/1588 tests passed.
